teammembers.title: Trainer
teammembers.bio: Charlotte is a passionate teacher and a forever student with a deep fascination for movement and healing arts. Throughout the years she has completed various trainings in vinyasa yoga, yin yoga and other healing arts as aromatherapy and reiki.
teammembers.tag_line: Completed various trainings in vinyasa yoga, yin yoga and other healing arts as aromatherapy and reiki

teammembers.title: Trainer
teammembers.bio: successfully completed three 200-hour RYT teacher training courses and her 300 hour RYT with Shades of Yoga. Restuning has studied a variety of Hatha Yoga traditions, including Ashtanga, Iyengar, Vinyasa Flow, and Yin yoga
teammembers.tag_line: Successfully completed three 200-hour RYT teacher training courses and her 300 hour RYT with Shades of Yoga.

teammembers.title: Trainer
teammembers.bio: No matter your age or ability, I invite you to experience the joy and challenge of Hatha vinyasa yoga in a practice that progressively develops your strength and flexibility, balances the left and right sides of your body, calms your mind and soothes your soul.
teammembers.tag_line: Completed a 200 hour Yoga Alliance approved Hatha Yoga course in 2007 with Shades of Yoga

teammembers.title: Trainer
teammembers.bio: No matter your age or ability, I invite you to experience the joy and challenge of Hatha vinyasa yoga in a practice that progressively develops your strength and flexibility, balances the left and right sides of your body, calms your mind and soothes your soul.
teammembers.tag_line: Pilates instructor fully qualified and Yoga trainer 200 hours Shades of yoga

teammembers.bio: Currently working as Business Manager within IT. Providing Class and One-in-One
